description:
Thumbnail Covers

A Figma cover template to use to indicate the status of a project, as well as the project or file types.


Master covers for you files

  • Documents
  • Project
  • Design System


Customisable Types, Icons, Labels and Status Indicators


Have suggestions? Let us know!

Old Mutual Design.


Updates


Version 2 on 12 January 2021

  • Updated variant options to switch descriptions on and off

  • Added cover files
  • Added variants
  • Added status indicators
  • Added icons
